title: Addition to Adam's naming tutorial
content:
[http://forum.fontlab.com/fontlab-studio-tips-and-tricks/font-family-nami...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203085349/http:/forum.fontlab.com/fontlab-studio-tips-and-tricks/font-family-naming-in-fontlab-studio-5-t313.0.html;msg23929#msg23929 "http://forum.fontlab.com/fontlab-studio-tips-and-tricks/font-family-naming-in-fontlab-studio-5-t313.0.html;msg23929#msg23929")

---------

Why does’nt the HTML character entitity (& r s q u o ;) work in the title?

Does it work here? ’’’ Yes.
author: Arno Enslin

comments.content: Because the title is set using sIFR (flash)? I suspect that is it. No special characters seem to work in Typophile thread titles.
